product.title: YEREVAN 2 in 1  Curler Straighter Rotating Iron for  Curling and Straighting, Professional Hot  Styler Irons Hairdressing Tool with Adjustable
product.description:
Transform your routine with this professional-grade 2-in-1 styler combining straightening and curling functions. The advanced infrared heating system penetrates shafts evenly while maintaining optimal moisture balance, reducing thermal damage by 35% compared to conventional tools. 
1x Rotating 2-Way Curler Straightener 
Flatirons Ceramic 2 Where The Wild Things Are Party Plates Hot Comb. 
Multi-Surface Ceramic Plates: Nano-coating technology creates mirror-smooth contact surface 
Precision Temperature: Choose from 300°F (fine ) to 410°F (thick/coarse textures) 
Salon Efficiency: Create 10+ styles - beach waves, tight curls or poker-straight looks 
Safety Features: 30-minute auto shut-off + heat-resistant storage pouch included 
Universal Voltage: 110-240V for worldwide travel

product.description_full:
Transform your routine with this professional-grade 2-in-1 styler combining straightening and curling functions. The advanced infrared heating system penetrates shafts evenly while maintaining optimal moisture balance, reducing thermal damage by 35% compared to conventional tools.

Universal Voltage: 110-240V for worldwide travel *  【Dual Styling Modes】Achieve sleek straight hair or bouncy curls with one versatile tool 
 *  【Infrared Heating Tech】Gentle heat distribution minimizes damage while sealing hair cuticles 
 *  【Smart Temp Control】3 heat settings (300°F-410°F) with auto-lock protection against overheating 
 *  【60s Rapid Heating】Ready-to-style indicator light saves morning prep time 
 *  【Ceramic Floating Plates】Glides smoothly through strands with reduced frizz and static
product.description_full_html:
Transform your routine with this professional-grade 2-in-1 styler combining straightening and curling functions. The advanced infrared heating system penetrates shafts evenly while maintaining optimal moisture balance, reducing thermal damage by 35% compared to conventional tools.
1x Rotating 2-Way Curler Straightener
Flatirons Ceramic 2 Where The Wild Things Are Party Plates Hot Comb.
Multi-Surface Ceramic Plates: Nano-coating technology creates mirror-smooth contact surface
Precision Temperature: Choose from 300°F (fine ) to 410°F (thick/coarse textures)
Salon Efficiency: Create 10+ styles - beach waves, tight curls or poker-straight looks
Safety Features: 30-minute auto shut-off + heat-resistant storage pouch included
Universal Voltage: 110-240V for worldwide travel

  • 【Dual Styling Modes】Achieve sleek straight hair or bouncy curls with one versatile tool
  • 【Infrared Heating Tech】Gentle heat distribution minimizes damage while sealing hair cuticles
  • 【Smart Temp Control】3 heat settings (300°F-410°F) with auto-lock protection against overheating
  • 【60s Rapid Heating】Ready-to-style indicator light saves morning prep time
  • 【Ceramic Floating Plates】Glides smoothly through strands with reduced frizz and static

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
